name: Router Protocol
description: Router Protocol is a Layer-1 blockchain powering chain abstraction and seamless cross-chain interoperability. It offers a range of products under its ecosystem, including Router Chain — a PoS blockchain built using Tendermint BFT and compatible with EVM and other VMs, designed to read and modify states across multiple chains. Other products include Router Nitro — an ultra-low latency bridge that supports cross-chain swaps across 30+ blockchains — and the Router Cross-chain Intent Framework, a plug-and-play infrastructure that enables dApps to integrate cross-chain functionality with ease.
